channel.title: Posts on Data Analyst's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Data Analyst's Blog

item.title: Introduction
item.description: This is my GitHub page where I post things that might be helpful for data analysts who want to learn some Python. The content will focus on specific functions or libraries in Python that I am using in my daily work. I will keep each blog as short as 1 to 3 minutes reading so that if anyone would read it, they don’t get bored before finishing reading. :-) My self-introduction can be found on this page.
